Class Converter

  • java.lang.Object
    • Converter
  • class Converter
extends java.lang.Object
    Roman Numeral Converter. This class holds all of the conversion logic for this program. It holds two encapsulated classes:
    • NumToRoman: This class holds the number to roman numeral logic
    • RomanToNum: This class holds the roman numeral to number logic
    It takes in input from the main class through use of the Scanner class.

    • Method Detail

      • getNum

        public void getNum​(int input)
        Check user integer input. Checks if the number the user has typed is too large, and if it is it displays an error message. If not, the number is processed in the NumToRoman class.

        Also runs the methods that return certain values for Applet access.

        Parameters:
        input - the users integer input

      • getRoman

        public void getRoman​(java.lang.String input)
        Check user String input. Simply checks the users String input and feeds it into the NumToRoman class.
        Parameters:
        input - the users String input

      • returnLength

        public int returnLength()
        Length of number for Applet access.
        Returns:
        length of input number

      • returnRoman

        public java.lang.StringBuffer returnRoman()
        Roman value for Applet access.
        Returns:
        final roman numeral value
